  • All Classes

Uses of Package
popt4jlib

  • Packages that use popt4jlib 
    Package Description
    analysis
    analysis package: a package implementing parallel algorithms for numerical differentiation and integration, and also including more complex transformations such as convolution.
    graph.packing
    Optimization package that obtains near-optimal solution to the 1- and 2-packing combinatorial optimization problem.
    graph.partitioning
    Package defines interfaces and implements algorithms for graph and hyper-graph partitioning.
    parallel
    parallel package: an implementation of all the synchronization, communication & coordination primitives required in popt4jlib.
    popt4jlib
    popt4jlib: a parallel optimization library for Java.
    popt4jlib.DE
    Differential Evolution Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.EA
    Evolutionary Algorithms Parallel Implementation
    popt4jlib.GA
    Genetic Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.GradientDescent
    Gradient-Descent Type Algorithms Parallel Implementation (suitable for real vector function optimization).
    popt4jlib.LocalSearch
    Local Search algorithms parallel implementation for combinatorial optimization problems.
    popt4jlib.MSSC
    Package implements algorithms for Minimum-Sum-of-Square(-Errors)-Clustering, a well-defined optimization problem.
    popt4jlib.MonteCarlo
    Monte-Carlo Search Parallel Implementation (aka random search)
    popt4jlib.NumberPartitioning
    Package defines parallel/distributed versions of well-known Number Partitioning algorithms.
    popt4jlib.PS
    Particle Swarm Optimization Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.PS.FA
    Firefly Algorithm Parallel Implementation.
    popt4jlib.SA
    Simulated Annealing Algorithms Parallel Implementation.
    tests
    tests package: defines functions used for testing the optimization algorithms in the popt4jlib library.
  • Classes in popt4jlib used by analysis 
    Class and Description
    FunctionIntf
    interface defining a function mapping objects of some domain (not necessarily R^n) to R.
    VecFunctionIntf
    definition of a vector function mapping vectors in R^n to vectors in R^m
    VectorIntf
    defines vectors in R^n
  • Classes in popt4jlib used by graph.packing 
    Class and Description
    AllChromosomeMakerClonableIntf
    interface specifying that AllChromosomeMakerIntf objects can be cloned.
    AllChromosomeMakerIntf
    allows the definition of the neighborhood of a point in a search space that is needed by Local-Search algorithms in combinatorial optimization problems.
    FunctionIntf
    interface defining a function mapping objects of some domain (not necessarily R^n) to R.
    OptimizerException
    Exception class used by most optimization algorithms in the popt4jlib package to indicate abnormal execution of some task.
  • Classes in popt4jlib used by graph.partitioning 
    Class and Description
    VectorIntf
    defines vectors in R^n
  • Classes in popt4jlib used by parallel 
    Class and Description
    IdentifiableIntf
    interface declares that implementing objects have long identifier.
  • Classes in popt4jlib used by popt4jlib 
    Class and Description
    AllChromosomeMakerClonableIntf
    interface specifying that AllChromosomeMakerIntf objects can be cloned.
    AllChromosomeMakerIntf
    allows the definition of the neighborhood of a point in a search space that is needed by Local-Search algorithms in combinatorial optimization problems.
    Arg2ChromosomeMakerIntf
    interface defining the methods that an object must support so as to be able to convert a function argument (an object type that the function being minimized accepts) into a chromosome object (notion used in GA, SA, PS, EA meta-heuristics among others).
    Chromosome2ArgMakerIntf
    the inverse map of the Arg2ChromosomeMakerIntf.
    DblArray1SparseVector
    sparse double[] implementation of VectorIntf, maintaining two arrays, an index array, and a values array.
    DblArray1SparseVectorMT
    sparse double[] implementation of VectorIntf, maintaining two arrays, an index array, and a values array.
    DblArray1Vector
    double[] implementation of VectorIntf.
    DblArray1VectorPool
    implements a thread-local pool of DblArray1Vector objects.
    FunctionIntf
    interface defining a function mapping objects of some domain (not necessarily R^n) to R.
    ObserverIntf
    This interface allows objects that want to be "monitoring" other "Subject" objects to be notified whenever a change in the subject occurs, and act accordingly.
    OptimizerException
    Exception class used by most optimization algorithms in the popt4jlib package to indicate abnormal execution of some task.
    PoolableObjectIntf
    interface specifies the contract for objects that can participate in thread-local object pools.
    RandomArgMakerClonableIntf
    interface specifying that RandomArgMakerIntf objects can be cloned.
    RandomArgMakerIntf
    interface class for constructing random arguments for a function.
    SparseVectorIntf
    this interface extends the standard VectorIntf in that it provides two methods to allow for (fast) loops over the non-zero elements of a sparse vector.
    SubjectIntf
    The SubjectIntf implements the Subject Object's methods in the well-known Observer Design Pattern.
    VectorIntf
    defines vectors in R^n
  • Classes in popt4jlib used by popt4jlib.DE 
    Class and Description
    FunctionIntf
    interface defining a function mapping objects of some domain (not necessarily R^n) to R.
    OptimizerException
    Exception class used by most optimization algorithms in the popt4jlib package to indicate abnormal execution of some task.
    OptimizerIntf
    the interface every optimizer (for unconstrained optimization) must implement.
    VectorIntf
    defines vectors in R^n
  • Classes in popt4jlib used by popt4jlib.EA 
    Class and Description
    Chromosome2ArgMakerIntf
    the inverse map of the Arg2ChromosomeMakerIntf.
    FunctionIntf
    interface defining a function mapping objects of some domain (not necessarily R^n) to R.
    NewChromosomeMakerIntf
    allows the creation of a new Object that will play the role of a chromosome in algorithms such as GA,EA,PS, etc.
    OptimizerException
    Exception class used by most optimization algorithms in the popt4jlib package to indicate abnormal execution of some task.
    OptimizerIntf
    the interface every optimizer (for unconstrained optimization) must implement.
    RandomChromosomeMakerIntf
    interface class for constructing random chromosome objects used in meta- heuristics such as GA,EA,PS,MC,SA etc.
